scripts.fetch:binance: npx tsc && npx cross-env EXCHANGE=BINANCE node -r source-map-support/register dist/fetch-pairs.js
scripts.fetch:binanceus: npx tsc && npx cross-env EXCHANGE=BINANCEUS node -r source-map-support/register dist/fetch-pairs.js
scripts.fetch:ftx: npx tsc && npx cross-env EXCHANGE=FTX node -r source-map-support/register dist/fetch-pairs.js
scripts.fetch:coinbase: npx tsc && npx cross-env EXCHANGE=COINBASE node -r source-map-support/register dist/fetch-pairs.js
scripts.fetch:bittrex: npx tsc && npx cross-env EXCHANGE=BITTREX node -r source-map-support/register dist/fetch-pairs.js
scripts.add-alerts: npx tsc && npx cross-env node -r source-map-support/register dist/add-alerts.js
